word: FOR EVERY LAWFUL, GOD-GIVEN PRIVILEGE, SATAN HAS A COUNTERFEIT TO SUGGEST. THE HOLY, PURE THOUGHT HE SEEKS TO REPLACE WITH THE IMPURE. FOR THE SANCTITY OF MARRIED LOVE HE WOULD SUBSTITUTE PERMISSIVENESS, UNFAITHFULNESS, EXCESS, AND PERVERSION; PREMARITAL SEX, ADULTERY, ANIMALISM IN AND OUTSIDE OF MARRIAGE, AND HOMOSEXUALITY. ALL ARE REFERRED TO IN THIS CHAPTER.--COMPILERS.
